game.name: Resident Evil Village

about.short: A first-person survival-horror experience where Ethan Winters must uncover the dark secrets of a mysterious European village.
about.full: Resident Evil Village is the eighth main entry in the Resident Evil franchise. Powered by Capcom’s RE Engine, the game delivers intense first-person horror, cinematic storytelling, and terrifying encounters with Lycans, mutants, and four powerful lords ruling the village. Players must explore the castle, factories, forests, and village as Ethan Winters while managing resources, solving puzzles, and battling deadly creatures. The Winters’ Expansion adds third-person mode, Mercenaries content, and the Shadows of Rose storyline.

game_mechanics: Weapon upgrades and customization via The Duke
Crafting system for ammo and healing
Intense boss battles and enemy variety
feature_list: Highly detailed environments using the RE Engine
Cross-platform support including PC, consoles, and Cloud
